thun kon satanak diyathwa athi awasthawaka, aththenma nila wipaksha parshwayan wana janatha wimukthi peramuna saha demala jathika sandhanayath salakillata ganne nam paksha pahaka tharagayak diyathwa athi awasthawaka, pasugiya da kosgama pawathi mahajana raliyak amathu janadhipathiwaraya, aapasu athithayata yamen walakwannayi janathawagen illa sitiyeya.

assalamu alaikum, obe lipiya me dinawala dadi gaweshanayakata lak karamin thibena bawath, ehi hisham bin urwa pilibadawa thiranayakata elambaima thawamath sankirna karanayak wi athi bawath, idiriye di obe lipiya padanam karagena me pilibadawa ‘yahamanga’ nigamanaya kumakda?

wicharakayaku wu ohu anathuruwa chithrapata nirmanaya karannata patan gaththeya.eyata pera lama wiye di siya piya sathu milimitar 8 pramanaye kamarawen keti chithrapata thannata patan gena thibima rupaye bhashawe a yanu aa yanu kiyannata ohuta maga penwuyeya.ohu mul wara thanu wruthanthaya kaw nam wiya.ohu ge chithrapata atharin mawisin thora ganna lada rum in da rom chithrapataya eyata wasara gananawakata pera chili jathika sinamakaru mathiyas wis wisin nirmanaya karana lada in bed nam chithrapatayema prathinirmanayak lesa dakwanu labe.kese ho wewa juliyo me gahanun dedena samaga jiwithaya winiwida yana sinama prakashayak narambaannata apata awasthawa laba deyi.ohu maha maga hadisiye hamuwana gahanun dedena samaga albage nawathana athulata apa ragena yayi.
